Claim: "Cato Institute scientists have noted that climate models have been over-hyping warming for decades."
Implication: "Climate models show 2.5 times more warming in the bulk atmosphere than has been observed."
Referring expressions: Cato Institute, scientists, climate models, warming  Climate models, bulk atmosphere, observed
Formula: (exists c (exists b (IsAtCatoInstitute(b) and HasOverhypedWarming(c))) & (forall h (forall i ( IsAtCatoInstitute(h) ->   HasBeenObserved(i))))) -> (exists a (exists f (HasMoreWarmingInBulkAtmosphere(a) and ~HasBeenObserved(f))))
